languages.text: {n}Бросив на вас обжигающе-возбужденный взгляд, Маражай вновь склоняет голову — на сей раз в подчеркнутой благодарности.{/n} "Мне стоит наточить свои клинки. Когда ты призовешь меня..."
{n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."
languages.original_text: {n}Бросив на вас обжигающе-возбужденный взгляд, Маражай вновь склоняет голову — на сей раз в подчеркнутой благодарности.{/n} "Мне стоит наточить свои клинки. Когда ты призовешь меня..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的眼中闪烁着兴奋的光芒。他低下头，向你鞠了一躬，有意做出一副满怀谢意的样子。{/n}“我会磨利我的利刃，随时等待你的召唤……”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的眼中闪烁着兴奋的光芒。他低下头，向你鞠了一躬，有意做出一副满怀谢意的样子。{/n}“我会磨利我的利刃，随时等待你的召唤……”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai arden de la emoción justo antes de inclinar la cabeza en otra reverencia; esta vez se trata de una muestra deliberada de gratitud.{/n} «Debo afilar mis espadas. Cuando me hagas llamar...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Marazhai arden de la emoción justo antes de inclinar la cabeza en otra reverencia; esta vez se trata de una muestra deliberada de gratitud.{/n} «Debo afilar mis espadas. Cuando me hagas llamar...».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai brillent d'excitation. Il incline la tête de nouveau, cette fois en guise de remerciement sincère.{/n} « Je dois terminer d'affûter mes lames. Quand vous me ferez appeler... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Marazhai brillent d'excitation. Il incline la tête de nouveau, cette fois en guise de remerciement sincère.{/n} « Je dois terminer d'affûter mes lames. Quand vous me ferez appeler... »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Augen glänzen vor Aufregung, bevor er erneut seinen Kopf senkt – dieses Mal als bewusstes Zeichen seiner Dankbarkeit.{/n} "Ich muss meine Klingen schärfen. Damit ich bereit bin, wenn Ihr mich ruft ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Augen glänzen vor Aufregung, bevor er erneut seinen Kopf senkt – dieses Mal als bewusstes Zeichen seiner Dankbarkeit.{/n} "Ich muss meine Klingen schärfen. Damit ich bereit bin, wenn Ihr mich ruft ..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの目は興奮に燃えていたが、再び頭を下げてお辞儀をする。今回は、わかりやすい感謝の意を示している。{/n}「俺は刃を磨かなければならない。お呼びがかかったときのためにな…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの目は興奮に燃えていたが、再び頭を下げてお辞儀をする。今回は、わかりやすい感謝の意を示している。{/n}「俺は刃を磨かなければならない。お呼びがかかったときのためにな…」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gözleri heyecanla parıldayan Marazhai, bu sefer kasti olarak minnettarlığını sunmak için önünde bir kez daha başını eğiyor.{/n} "Bıçaklarımı bilemem gerek. Beni çağırdığında..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes blaze with excitement before he drops his head in another bow — this time in a deliberate show of gratitude.{/n} "I must hone my blades. When you call upon me..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu sefer kasti olarak minnettarlığını sunmak için önünde bir kez daha başını eğmeden önce Marazhai'ın gözleri heyecanla parıldıyor.{/n} "Bıçaklarımı bilemem gerek. Beni çağırdığında..."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
